```{r}
library(pwr)
```

```{r}
# Number of Samples (# of transects)
K = 36

# Sample Size (number of data points/transect)
N = 1

# Significance level
sig = 0.05

# F Statistic
F = 0.2

# Power 
P = 1

```

```{r}
#Test for power
pwr.anova.test(k = K, n = N, f = F, sig.level = sig)

#Test for F statistic
pwr.anova.test(k = K, n = N, sig.level = sig, power = P)
```
